// frontend/src/EventList.js
import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventList=()=>{const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchEvents=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/events');setEvents(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching events:',error);}};fetchEvents();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Upcoming Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{marginBottom:'20px',border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:event.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Date: ",new Date(event.date).toLocaleDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Location: ",event.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",event.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Available Tickets: ",event.availableTickets]})]},event._id))})]});};export default EventList;
